content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "web_search" command to search for the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The search returned a list of URLs related to the query. I used the "google" command to search for information on the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. I received a list of URLs. I used the "browse_website" command to find information on the attractions, activities, and accommodations available in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The command returned links to travel websites featuring articles and guides on various destinations and travel interests, including practical tips, activity suggestions, and accommodation recommendations for travelers. However, there was no specific information on the best attractions or activities in these places. I used the "web_search" command to search for travel guide PDFs for Boston, Porto, and Switzerland, but only found general travel information. I executed
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://hikingisgood.com/around-the-brno-reservoir/", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.south-moravia.com/en/sights/o70544-brno-reservoir", "https://www.tripsavvy.com/top-things-to-do-in-brno-czech-republic-5112855"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the route and terrain of the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the Brno Reservoir trail in Czechia. The trail is not a loop around the entire reservoir, but there are sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The mapped 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area includes rolling hills and starts at the top of the reservoir closest to Brno. The Veveří Castle Area, located a few km west of the reservoir, also offers decent options for running.

    },

        "title": "Brno Reservoir Trail | Map, Guide - South Moravian, Czech Republic ...",
        "href": "https://www.alltrails.com/en-gb/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada",

Along the route you can find a few places for refreshments and there are also two places where the summer water transport stops to take you to the other side of the dam."
    },

        "body": "Features: Along the Water Trail Running Categories: Estates and Castles There's some nice running in the area of the Brno Reservoir, a dam complex located 10 km west of Brno that's popular place for swimming and boating. Although there isn't a loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are some sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk."
